title: Whisper a Warning
description: Fiery Willow Blake will go to any length to stand up for a cause, no matter what the cost. She's dedicated to her real estate career in the small town of Ryerstown, Pennsylvania, and volunteers with handicapped children in a horseback riding program in her spare time. When she finds herself in a real estate transaction with a client who makes her very suspicious, she daringly begins to investigate the deal.Her search leads her to Rockford Harrison, the new lawyer in town. Haunted by the violent death of his best friend, Peter, Rockford has traded in a high-profile position in a prestigious New York City law firm for a quiet, low-pressure position in Ryerstown. Rockford falls hard for the fiercely independent Willow, and becomes determined to protect her from the dangers her sleuthing sets in motion, fearful that she will end up like Peter.But Willow will not be deterred, she is determined to find the truth. If Rockford wants to keep her safe, he has to join her in her quest...Can Willow and Rockford beat the odds? And can they trust each other enough to keep their newfound love alive?
author: Christine Bush
